context_tracker.description: Tracks state of AlphaInsights documentation memory system.

structure.intelligence_logs: Houses chronological technical and analytical discovery logs.
structure.knowledge_capsules: Contains persistent conceptual and analytical documents.
structure.progress_logs: Captures project milestones, iteration notes, and retrospectives.
structure.archive: Stores deprecated or superseded knowledge assets.

context_tracker.next_phase: Populate ai_agents_spec.md and knowledge capsule templates.

rules: All folders must exist before file creation.
No file may be partially defined; full content required.
